act_info.full_title: Religious Freedom Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. R.22
act_info.citation: Religious Freedom Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. R.22

content.section: Free exercise of religious profession, etc., guaranteed
content.content: 1. The free exercise and enjoyment of religious profession and worship, without discrimination or preference, provided the same be not made an excuse for acts of licentiousness, or a justification of practices inconsistent with the peace and safety of the Province, is by the constitution and laws of this Province assured to all Her Majesty’s subjects within the same. R.S.O. 1990, c. R.22, s. 1. ____________________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. The free exercise and enjoyment of religious profession and worship, without discrimination or preference, provided the same be not made an excuse for acts of licentiousness, or a justification of practices inconsistent with the peace and safety of the Province, is by the constitution and laws of this Province assured to all Her Majesty’s subjects within the same. R.S.O. 1990, c. R.22, s. 1.

____________________
